mapper.select: select rno, bid, btitle, bhits, bdate from(select rownum rno, bid, btitle, bhits, to_char(bdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') bdate from(select bid, btitle, bhits, bdate from cgv_board order by bdate desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}
select bid, btitle, bcontent, bhits, bdate, bfile, bsfile from cgv_board where bid=#{bid}
mapper.update: update cgv_board set bhits=bhits+1 where bid=#{bid}
update cgv_board set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent}, bfile=#{bfile}, bsfile=#{bsfile} where bid=#{bid}
